name: Where Am I In Australia? Quiz | Geography | 10 Questions

questions.text: I have just driven across the Narrows Bridge going south toward Mandurah, where am I?
questions.explanation:
Perth.

	The Narrows Bridge links the northern and southern areas of Perth.

questions.text: I have just crossed the Westgate Bridge, which city am I in?
questions.explanation:
Melbourne.

	The collapse of the partly built Westgate Bridge in Melbourne on Oct 15, 1970 killed 35 workers and was Australia's worst bridge disaster.

questions.text: I am standing in the first Australian town lit by electricity, where am I?
questions.explanation:
Tamworth.

	Tamworth NSW was the first Australian town to be lit by electricity on Nov 8, 1888

questions.text: I have just left Marree on my way to southwest Queensland, travelling on a famous route, what am I travelling on?
questions.explanation:
The Birdsville Track.

	Developed in the 1880s The Birdsville track stretches 500 kms from Marree near Lake Eyre in South Australia to Queensland, a famous stock route of old . This track has claimed the lives of many people who attempted to traverse the Sturt Stony Desert. Today it is an easy one day drive.

questions.text: It's October and the jacarandas are lovely, the festival is in full swing, what town am I in?
questions.explanation:
Grafton.

	Grafton on the north coast of NSW has become famous for its jacaranda festival held each year .

questions.text: I am standing on top of mainland Australia's highest peak, where am I?
questions.explanation:
Mt Kosciuszko.

	Polish born explorer Paul Strzelecki named Mt Kosciusko after one of his homeland's democratic heroes .

questions.text: I am standing on the runway of Bert Hinkler airport, what town am I near?
questions.explanation:
Bundaberg.

	Bert Hinkler was a famous aviator from Bundaberg in Queensland .

questions.text: I am standing on Australia's most easterly point, where am I?
questions.explanation:
Cape Byron.

	Cape Byron is famous as Australia's most easterly point. The beaches of Watego and Tallow are well known to the surfing fraternity.

questions.text: I have just passed the Sandfire roadhouse on the way to Broome . I have the great sandy desert on my right and a famous beach way on my left, what beach am I passing?
questions.explanation:
Eighty Mile Beach.

	Fishing and shell collecting is popular along the beautiful 80 mile beach in north west Australia, this is a starkly beautiful part of Australia's north .

questions.text: I am at the place Ned Kelly was captured, where am I?
